phrases: As huge as it is, it sure looks grand.
Are you saying it would not look grand if it was small?!
That is how you took it?
Even if you are still an apprentice,
you are something of an art dealer, Kawafuji.
Are you only praising the size because you do not know any better?
Or is the size the only thing praiseworthy about it?
He is still a real pain in the ass...
The director should be here soon.
M-May I please have a glass of water?
What am I supposed to say to the director?
You returned because he said he would forgive you.
The rest depends on your state of mind.
For what it is worth, I bought a cell phone strap to give him.
He is not a high school girl, you know.
And these are not cute at all.
If you keep sighing like that,
you will bring me down, too.
The director is going to look at my calligraphy soon.
What will I do if he lambastes it before I exhibit at Naruka?
I will never be able to recover!
I do not think he will do that.
You brought it because you felt confident about it, right?
As someone who is known me a long time, what do you think?
Would you be able to tell I wrote that?
When you ask me that way, I am not sure how to answer...
But I think it is good calligraphy.
I never would have imagined you writing anything like it before.
I do not write calligraphy like this!
Sorry, but I do not get what you are trying to say.
It just does not feel right!
I do not know how I did it!
In short, you are saying it is a fluke?
Do not put it so simply!
But that is exactly what it is, darn it!
Anybody could write something like that if they went to the island!
There is nothing odd about that, is there?
You do not have to beat yourself up over using a different style than usual.
You could just describe it as a little experimentation.
If I keep doing that, I will never find my own calligraphy style.
If you are studying to be a farmer,
going fishing on a whim and catching a hisan iwo does not make you a fisherman!
I want to find my own flower and raise it until it blooms!
A flower unlike any other in the world!
The one that was always my special only one!
Are you implying that you do not have to be number one?
A farmer cannot become a fisherman, you say?
That is a very amusing analogy, Handa-kun.
the successful ones are those who perfect their own idiosyncrasies.
I am sorry I did not come to see you in.
No, I came to meet with Handa-kun.
Oh, no need to be so formal.
You spoke more naturally with me before.
No, I went too far last time, sir!
I need to properly apologize and get his forgiveness.
The director has a bad back.
No matter how upset I may have been,
how could I have hit someone who is like this?
What I did was truly inexcusable.
I should have apologized much sooner.
and for returning once I knew I would be forgiven,
The truth is, I was not planning on forgiving you.
I only said that to lure you back here,
so I could give you a long lecture on human morality.
But it appears that will not be necessary.
Just refrain from behaving so impulsively in the future.
I was not sure what I would do if you did not forgive me.
Truly, sir, thank you very much.
Now give him the cell phone strap.
You know this is not the time for that!
I wish to see your calligraphy up close.
Could you lend me a hand?
So this is what you wrote after taking time to mature?
And I just told you not to behave impulsively...
Do not laugh, do not laugh, do not laugh...
This calligraphy is a test work!
My submission for the exhibition is still packed up, so I could not bring it here!
True, it is unreasonable to expect to see your work this close to the deadline.
I am sorry that I showed you this trashy calligraphy!
Well then, I will appraise this as a test work.
You have written something so interesting, I would not have recognized it as yours.
The character is one you would see in a grade school assignment,
but in it, I can see the stars of the night sky.
It shows the hopelessness of being left behind in the dark,
along with the light that is only visible in darkness.
Although I would not be the only one to judge it,
I would deem it worthy of a grand prize.
Now I really look forward to it.
If this is a test work,
then I should see some even more wonderful calligraphy at Naruka.
This has been a most fruitful day.
Oh, Director, let me call you a taxi.
I do not need a taxi.
My ride is waiting for me.
Thank you very much for coming!
It appears that sending Seishuu-kun to the island was the correct decision.
He still has a long way to go.
I am sorry, the engine stalled.
I am not very good at starting up slopes.
It looks like your dad was...
Ship me back to the island...
My, it is been quite a while, Kawafuji-kun!
Do not run away, cold-hearted jerk!
I am guessing you have not gotten anywhere.
What is that on your head?
An attempt to get back the form you had on the island?
I thought it would give me at least a little inspiration.
The deadline for the exhibition is tomorrow!
This is not the time to be doing stuff like that!
Do you have to scold me like that?
I tried writing Star in the same way as before.
Yeah, with that flavor, you could aim for grand prize!
If you wrote it the exact same way, then it is a cinch!
Now it really is like a grade school assignment.
I knew you would say that!
I tried to write it exactly the same way, but I cannot!
No matter how hard I stare at the night sky,
the city lights are too bright for me to get anxious!
That makes it this much different from before?
It turns out I am more influenced by my environment than I ever knew.
So you were only stable before
because you would never had any major distress in your life.
But you have always entered exhibitions before, have not you?
Would I bother calling someone like you over if I could manage this by myself?!
How could you say that to your only friend?
There is nothing I can do f
There is but one thing you can do for me.
What is the point of this, again?
I cannot tie it if you are moving!
Sensei, who am I supposed to be?
I do not even like children that much.
All you have to do is keep quiet and cry!
Oh, might you be Sensei's mother?
What on earth are you doing?
This is not what it looks like!
It is to help me write calligraphy!
I am telling you, it is not like that, Mom!
while I am a crybaby first grader!
He used to be a good boy.
he was kind at heart, the type young people would call prickly-sweet, and beloved by all.
And yet, now he is become prickly-stupid?!
Neither part of that is lovable at all!
This is all because he went to that island!
this just felt very reminiscent of the island.
But is not it simplistic to expect to write good calligraphy
just by reenacting things you did on the island?
Do not get in my bed!
Just ditch the calligraphy you could only write on the island, and hurry back here to Tokyo!
I knew you had a porn stash!
If you are not in the exhibition, Sensei, then I do not feel like doing it, either.
The prize money is not all that much,
and it is not like it would make me really famous.
Maybe I will write a bunch and hold a one-man exhibition...
Do you realize how much I have riding on this exhibition?
Sure, it is not a major exhibition.
But to me, it is a crucial first step toward a new start in life.
I will definitely take that step.
Why did you call this kid over, anyway?
I thought just Naru would not be enough to bring out the mood.
now I can see how serious you are.
Here is some help from me.
Kawafuji-san asked us to talk to you because you seemed lonely.
So we all gathered at the store.
but Hiro-nii is deeply worried about you, too!
Why are you talking like that?
Since you left without saying anything,
it is been nuts over here.
Or I am going to feed ya my fist!
What you need most are friends, right?
I thought up a good punishment for ya leavin' without sayin' anythin'!
I heard you were distressed over not being able to do good work.
I cannot believe how considerate you are.
Your consideration would put adults to shame.
I think I will be fine, if I can stir up some inspiration by remembering the island.
He is seriously discussing his worries with a child.
Well, I am not exactly in a slump,
but when I need to write, I just cannot do it.
Tell me before you switch, you guys!
It is borin' without you here, Sensei.
There is still gobs of stuff I want to do with ya.
Sensei, are you looking for something?
Well, I am not sure if I brought it with me or not,
but since it was from the last job I did there, then maybe...
Kanzaki, go buy paper for writing practice!
Why do I have to do it?!
At last, he is taking action.
I just hope he does not do anything strange again.
I was against this from the beginning.
I do not want him going to that island again!
In that case, you should persuade him not to go.
He is already decided he wants to go!
Are you telling me to hurt him?!
We also share the responsibility for Sei becoming all work and no play.
It is not for us to dictate our son's direction in life.
If leaving here will allow him to grow,
then all we can do is watch over him.
If that is the path a man must take...
A work done using all my ability.
I have never done calligraphy like this before.
I heard they have displayed our summer vacation homework in the hallway!
Let us go check it out!
I cannot wait to see it!
I bet we will win gold prizes!
Sensei would be so thrilled if we did!
Let us get double-gold and give him a big surprise!
Sensei'd better thank God for givin' him such capable disciples!
I am going to the restroom.
Miwa-chan, just snap out of it already!
What is wrong with a silver prize?
There is a world of difference between first and second!
